snippet.title: Sunlight Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Sunlight is a short, vibrant and thought captivating exploration game. Wishlist on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/1451120
Releases 14th Jan.

Traverse a harmonious hand painted forest in this first person hike. The trees guide you with gentle whispers, as you explore a philosophical story. Each tree with different voices, genders and dialects, speaking as one.

Playtime: 30 minutes.
